name: Cuong Pham 0001
content: Cuong Pham's webSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationWelcome to Cuong Pham's personal webI am an Associate Professor of Computer Science at Posts and Telecommunications Institute of Technology (PTIT) and a Research Scientist at Qualcomm AI Research (acquiring  VinAI's Research division since April 2025). I am also the Dean of Artificial Intelligence faculty and the Director of PTIT.AI Research Lab., PTIT.  Previously, I was a Research Scientist at VinAI Research (from November 2019 to March 2025); a Marie Curie Research Fellow at Philips Research, High-Tech campus Eindhoven, the Netherlands; a Research Associate at Open Lab, Newcastle University, UK; a Research Assistant at Jornada Experimental Range, the United State Department of Agriculture, USA; and a Teaching Assistant at PTIT. My research interests include Deep Generative models, Computer Vision, Human Activity Recognition, Deep Learning and Pervasive Healthcare. News26 Jun 2025. Two papers “SuMa: A Subspace Mapping Approach for Complete and Effective Concept Erasure in Text-to-Image Diffusion Models” and "Supercharged One-step Text-to-Image Diffusion Models with Negative Prompts" have been accepted to ICCV 2025, Hawaii, USA2 Mar 2025. Our article "Class-Agnostic Repetitive Action Counting Using Wearable Devices" has been accepted as a Regular Paper (S1) for publication in IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (TPAMI) (Impact Factor = 20,8).26 Feb 2025. Two papers "SwiftEdit: Lightning Fast Text-guided Image Editing via One-step Diffusion" and "Any3DIS Class-Agnostic 3D Instance Segmentation by 2D Mask Tracking" have been accepted to CVPR 2025. Nashville, Tennessee, USA.9 Dec 2024. Our paper "REM: A Scalable Reinforced Multi-Expert Framework for Multiplex Influence Maximization" has been accepted to AAAI 2025, Philadelphia, PA, USA. 2 July 2024. Our paper " SwiftBrush v2: Make Your One Step Diffusion Better Than Its Teacher" has been accepted to ECCV 2024, Milan, Italy. 26 April 2024. Our paper "Active Learning Framework for Incomplete Networks" by Khong Tung, Cong Tran, and Cuong Pham has been accepted  to the 40th Conference on Uncertainty in Artificial Intelligence (UAI) 2024,  Barcelona, Spain.  27 Feb. 2024.  We have 3 papers:  "Blur2Blur: Blur Conversion for Unsupervised Image Deblurring on Unknown Domains"; "EFHQ: Multi-purpose ExtremePose-Face-HQ dataset"; and "Open3dis: Open-vocabulary 3d instance segmentation with 2d mask guidance" got accepted to CVPR 2024, Seattle, USA.9 Dec. 2023, our paper "Count What You Want: Exemplar Identification and Few-shot Counting of Human Actions in the Wild " has been accepted to AAAI 202427 Feb. 2023.  our paper "HyperCUT: Video Sequence from a Single Blurry Image using Unsupervised Ordering" has been accepted to CVPR 2023, Vancouver, Canada. 14 Sep. 2022.  our paper "QC-StyleGAN - Quality Controllable Image Generation and Manipulation" has been accepted to NeurIPS 2022,  New Orleans, USA. Research Projects1. Principal Investigator, Automated Monitoring Respiratory Symptoms Using AI and the Internet of Things, national research project grant no. DT.023/17, funded by the Ministry of Information and Communication, 20175. Research member, Balance@Home [I led the Fiber Chopping board sub-project], funded by the European Union's  Seventh Framework Programme for Research (FP7)    6.
